message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I believe it holds significant value for you, and after careful consideration, I'm proposing a price of $1,300,000.  This feels like a fair starting point, recognizing the mutual benefits.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious offer. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective on the value. However, my initial price was carefully considered based on the significant benefits this product offers you. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,250,000. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the true worth of the product.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $1,180,000 for the product. I believe this price is a fair compromise that balances the value of the product with my budget constraints. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be entirely transparent, I have another buyer interested at a lower price point.  However, I believe this product can be significantly more impactful for you, and I'd prefer to see it in your hands.  My final offer is $1,210,000.  This offer reflects the absolute bottom of what I'm willing to accept.

Alice, I appreciate your honesty and willingness to work with me. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product. I believe this price is a fair compromise that reflects the value of the product, and I'm willing to make a serious offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm ready to move forward.
